price: (7) When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
